N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-3.2 - Eligibility requirements for SSPNA
State Regulations

To be eligible for SSPNA, an individual or couple
must: (a) reside in NYS; (b) be in active receipt of SSI
benefits; (c) reside in a
residential health care facility regulated under article 28 of the Public

Health Law; and
(d) have no
countable income, earned or unearned, other than the federal SSI benefit
provided to residents of medical facilities for whom the Medical Assistance

Program pays at least 50 percent of the cost of care. Notes
